summary.span: 一个允许 扩展访问工作流服务宿主的类。

span.span: A class that allows extensions access to the workflow service host.
Resumes a bookmark asynchronously.

summary.span: 使用指定的书签、值、回调方法和用户提供的状态数据，以异步方式从书签中恢复工作流。

span.span: Resumes a workflow from a bookmark asynchronously using the specified bookmark, value, callback method, and user-provided state data.
A reference to the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定恢复操作是否成功，请调用 。To determine if the resume operation was successful, call . 可以从回调方法的内部或外部调用 。 can be called from inside or outside of the callback method. 如果在恢复操作完成前调用 ，则此调用将会被阻止，直至恢复操作完成。If is called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation completes.

summary.span: 使用指定的书签、值、超时间隔、回调方法和用户提供的状态，以异步方式从书签中恢复工作流。

span.span: Resumes a workflow from a bookmark asynchronously using the specified bookmark, value, time-out interval, callback method, and user-provided state.
A reference to the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定恢复操作是否成功，请调用 。To determine if the resume operation was successful, call . 可以从回调方法的内部或外部调用 。 can be called from inside or outside of the callback method. 如果在恢复操作完成前调用 ，则此调用将会被阻止，直至恢复操作完成。If is called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation completes. 默认情况下，恢复操作必须在 30 秒内完成，否则将在 中引发 。By default, the resume operation must complete in 30 seconds or a is thrown from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以调用此方法来确定 操作是否成功。This method can be called to determine whether a operation was successful. 如果在恢复操作完成前调用此方法，则此调用将会被阻止，直至恢复操作完成。If called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation is complete.
